<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"POST /auth/tokens/revoke"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/auth/tokens/revoke"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Revoke a specific JWT access token by its JTI claim.
Admins can revoke any token. Users can only revoke their own.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
